long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "This Chrome extension enhances your browsing experience by appending '/api' to the base URL of the current page, allowing you to easily view the server's API response for that specific endpoint. If the server supports an API route and returns a valid response, the extension will display the information directly in your browser, providing developers and testers with a quick way to check server data without needing to manually modify the URL or use external tools. Please note that this extension does not collect or store any user data, ensuring your privacy and security."
